author: Constantin Viorel
comment: Nice looking  and useful. About everything you could ask from a smart watch.

author: Aaron Carolipio
comment: Hopefully this update helps the battery life on a huawei watch.  Other than that, this is definitely worth the purchase!  Must have.
title: Great watchface

author: ViTALiTY XiLE
comment: I love how the watch face looks and all the info it provides is wonderful. After installing and even after further tweaking of the settings to limit how often it updates, I still noticed significant battery drain from my phone. Unfortunately that is a deal breaker as I need my phone to last a full day.
title: Great design, bad battery life

author: Isaiah ii
comment: I really like it and have using it for a few days now but it eats up the battery on my Huawei watch compared to some others.  I still get through a whole day but instead of the 26-32 hours I get on most faces I get about 18-20 on this face.  I wish it had some more customisation options like changing the hand styles, font and smooth seconds.  Also some custom tick marker settings would spice it up and allowing the removing of the tick markers and using numbers or some other design.  Overall a solid face that's worth the $1.40

author: Irfan Ahmed
comment: This watchface is true meaning of smartwatch cause I used Casio watches and they have limited sensors but using this watchface you have everything on your wrist and can set whatever mode you need
title: Truly served the purpose of smart watch

author: Vitaly Zayko
comment: Still unable to setup my watch. System info shows that phone component is installed, but no app icon and no chance to run to change default settings (Urban/Nexus 5). Drains watch battery pretty fast.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Could you please send us your situation in detail?
The setting screen is on the 'Android Wear' app.You can find it on the 'Android Wear' app on your phone.Just open 'Android Wear' app and you can find the S01 icon in the facelist on the Android Wear app.
For more questions,We can give you a help.
Thank you.

author: Mark Boyer
comment: After using this watch face for a few days, it stopped pulling the weather information onto the watch. Tried to reboot the watch to see if that worked, nope. Tried a couple of things in the app settings, but that didn't work either.
title: Stopped pulling weather information

author: hunter Thomas
comment: Not happy weather not working or solar i cant get it to work on any paid screen i have help please
title: Andrew

author: Jon Enriquez
comment: I love this watch face I've used out several weeks now with good results , the weather does not work now and the step count is incorrect
title: Weather quit working ??

author: Clayton Kirkland
comment: I love the look of these watch faces and the different options are nice. However, my smart watch battery drained very quickly with this app. Once I switched away, my battery went back to lasting a couple of days. It also does not show the correct step count. It should connect with fitness apps (like Google Fit). Otherwise the fitness option on this watch face is useless.
title: Drains Watch Battery, Incorrect Step Counter

author: Olu Ola
comment: I would give this app 5 stars if the body and hours in interactive mode can be customized. Any chance of this happening?
title: Almost perfect.

author: Sanjay WS
comment: I installed the face but the app doesn't appear on the phone. Pls assist.
title: No app on phone

author: Jaime Mejia
comment: I like it work pretty good very satisfying

author: Doug Todd
comment: It would be great if the watch face was even more customisable so that each section could be changed separately
title: Great but something to make it even better
